entry.title: $2550 // 6 mo rental - Furnished, Newly Updated 1 BR, Steps from Prospect Park
entry.content:
Six month rental of a fantastic one bedroom apartment in Prospect Heights.

The building:
--Just off Grand Army Plaza, steps from Prospect Park and 2/3 train. Short walk to B & Q trains.
--Four story brick building (third floor apartment) with outstanding shared roof deck, bike storage and laundry in basement, friendly neighbors.

The apartment:
--One bedroom, 550-600 square feet, 3rd floor walk up
--Amazing light from six front facing windows
--Updated kitchen with new countertops, dishwasher and sink
--Newly painted top to bottom
--Furnished with double bed (brand new pillowtop mattress), dressers, couch, coffee table, TV, breakfast bar/island, lamps, living room rug, and kitchen supplies

The rental:
--We live in the apartment next door and are renting short-term until we take over the unit ourselves.
--We own and manage the apartment - and we are its neighbors - so very accessible if issues with the unit arise
--Renters would be expected to pay utilities (electric, cable/internet, cooking gas). Heat is covered through the building.
--Renters would be responsible for taking care of furnishings aside from normal wear

Please email with any questions or to arrange a visit.
